Reviews.Title: “accommodation was good”
Reviews.Author: Charli_32
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel al vagon march 2011 venice carnivale hotel meet budget slightly worried 2 star hotel finally found hotel al vagon instructions directions late night past midnight found hotel quicker daylight dropped bridge wrong finally found hotel waiting street flights stairs amazing ceilings nice decor sash windows comfy bed spacious bathroom shower cubicle hotel kettle drinks hotel offer advisable staying mabye pack own visited winter hotels restaurant canal found little cafe piazza opposite especially mornings coffee breakfast snack mid morning lovely hot coffee favourite breakfast pancakes bananas location location fairly central attractions venice including train station bridge st marks square etc definitely recommend hotel found owner friendly able answer queries assist etc

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, value for money, nice location”

Reviews.Content: hi stayed hotel al vagon month july days hotel staff friendly hotel nofrills hotel lot call roomservice staff helpful terms guiding etc location nice close city square rialto bridge finding hotel hidden lanes clean eating nearby including hotels own restaurant rates pretty cheap feel value paid
